verses.roman:
sei kṛṣṇa avatīrṇa--caitanya-īśvara
ataeva āra saba,--tāṅhāra kiṅkara

synonyms: sei—that; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; avatīrṇa—descended; caitanya-īśvara—Lord Caitanya, the Supreme Personality of Godhead; ataeva—therefore; āra—others; saba—all; tāṅhāra kiṅkara—His servants.
translation: That same Lord Kṛṣṇa has descended as Lord Caitanya, the Supreme Personality of Godhead. Everyone, therefore, is His servant.
